entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BarBackgroundColor and BarTextColor don't change color on Android #5590
  • Shift Handler?.UpdateValue to happen after all PropertyChanged events have fired #5587
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should optimize OnPlatform #5583
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WinUI] Button.LineBreakMode currently not working #5580
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • UILabel VerticalTextAlignment not working on iOS when there's a background #5575
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Better XAML Compilation for Styles #5574
  • Boxview corner radius not working in Mac OS and iOS #5572
    6.0.300-servicing
  • bad grid layout #5571
    6.0.300
  • opacity is ignored for Image background #5568
  • border bug #5567
  • image size calculation #5565

Closed

  • Label.FormattedText does not support FontAttributes on Android, crashes on Windows #5576
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching.IDispatcherTimer frequently fires too early #5335
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • MAUI Blazor cannot get html element dimension using javascript #5585
  • [Bug] Dismissing iOS Modal Form Page causes NRE #2948
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Shadow effect not showing in WinUI #4471
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Alignment on MacCatalyst is now incorrect after recent FlowDirection changes #5537
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Tabbar Renders as Blank White Screen on iOS #5549
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Flyout Menu Renders Fullscreen when App Initially Opens #5550
  • Placeholder text alignment is wrong on windows #3808
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Warning throws for tabid syntax with stylecop analyzers #4226
  • After update VS 2022 android maui project not build XamlCompiler error WMC1007 #5469
  • Label HorizontalOptions are backwards #5564

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid reconstructing handler when it is already available #5591
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Clip image to ImageView bounds when using CenterCrop (AspectFill) #5589
  • [android] update to the latest AndroidX packages #5588
  • Better VSMac workaround #5584
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮
  • Reference Maui.Graphics as workload pack #5577
    area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • Fix DispatcherTimer IsRuning=false during Tick #5578
    platform/windows 🪟, area/dispatching, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Get font manager from element with handler #5586
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Modernize Essentials Namespaces #5562
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • #2948 Fixed ios modalpage dissmiss exception #5566
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Removed extra " #5582
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix more text alignment issues #5563
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix _omnisharp.sln #5579
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [ci] Sign new font on the template #5570
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Don't need to sign on full release #5569
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Updated Gallery to verify Slider Maximum value can be updated #5463
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Update AOT Profile #5559

Updated

  • Review of the "Essentials" interface API #5407
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update global.json to use `6.0.300-preview` #5560
    area/setup 🪄
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Ported pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms #5510
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • If needed, put WebView2 user data dir under LocalApplicationData. Fixes #4151 #5306
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update MAUI Graphics #5552
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix SearchBar TextChanged event not working issue #5462
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
